judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Manderino dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph O. Murray and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Bryan Appeal.
Submitted November 8, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Joseph O. Murray and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellant.
No brief submitted for appellee.
January 24, 1974:
